items.name: Death Claw
implicitMods: +11% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
craftedMods: +1 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that multiplies damage over time and increases skill effect duration of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 20% more Damage over Time
You and nearby allies have 20% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 75% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
You and nearby Allies have 4% increased Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
You and nearby allies gain 20% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 31% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 31% increased Attack Speed
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 38 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill. Minions cannot gain the Lifetap buff.

Gain Lifetap after Spending a total of 273 Life on Upfront
Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill
Supported Skills deal 19% more Damage while you have Lifetap
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Taste of Hate
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 15% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 12% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: Blight Finger
craftedMods: Non-Channelling Skills have -7 to Total Mana Cost

items.typeLine: Saturated Divine Life Flask of the Antidote
explicitMods: Grants Immunity to Poison for 17 seconds if used while Poisoned
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Progenesis
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism

5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

fracturedMods: 58% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect

items.name: Wilma's Requital
explicitMods: 24% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed apply to Attack Speed
flavourText: Hemmed and hawed, for her to stay
Oh, what I'd give for one more day
For she's the one that got away

Grants Elusive

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire arrows into the air that rain down around the targeted area, dealing damage to enemies they hit and creating spore pods where they land. Each spore pod deals chaos damage over time to nearby enemies and slows their movement speed. The pods last for a duration before bursting, dealing area damage.

60% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
